context: Hello ! What is your favorite movie of 2018 so far?

Hmmm. I'm not sure. I haven't been to the movies in awhile. Tonight, I'm interested in seeing something with a serial killer. An example of a movie like this that I like is The Silence of the Lambs (1991) .
resp: Yes , i have seen that movie . It is good. Have you by any chance seen Zodiac (2007) ?
